website_summaries.verdict: This quality filter might be more effective than what you really need, but it's a great choice.
pros: Filters the most particles out of the air and is extremely effective at accomplishing this task
Works well for pet owners, as it also removes pet dander from the air
cons: Could be overkill unless you have pets, bad allergies, or other problems that lead to dirty air

customer_reviews.title: Very Dangerous Product. Questionable if actually made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Be extremely careful opening the shrink wrap. The metal lattice on the filter is razor sharp. It sliced my finger right open when I punctured the shrink wrap. Upon inspection, I noted that whatever manufacturing method was used to cut out the lattice left very very sharp edges on the metal. There ought to be a warning or something as this product is capable of inflicting a very deep cut. I question whether this product is actually made in the USA as claimed. The sharp edges on the metal appear to me to be one example of where the manufacturer skimped on product quality, in addition to its very flimsy and cheap looking construction.
customer_reviews.author: Jah Rasta

customer_reviews.title: I think the filter are fine except for the fact when I opened the package ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the filter are fine except for the fact when I opened the package all the filters bent. I took a picture of them. My suggestion is better package! If I were to order again...and they're damaged, you'll get them back.
customer_reviews.author: Boggieg

customer_reviews.title: The filters were damaged. There was no protection in ...
customer_reviews.text: The filters were damaged. There was no protection in the box to prevent the crushing and tearing of the filters. I was looking forward to using these highly regarded filters, however, I cant evaluate their effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Alessi

customer_reviews.title: The filters look good, the packaging is where it looses a star
customer_reviews.text: The filters look good, the packaging is where it looses a star. Two filters were slightly crushed upon delivery. I don't know if this is what happens when they are in storage in the company warehouse, or through the delivery. Better packaging would help. Mine could be bent slightly in order to function, but it does create a "whistle" when air flows, but it's liveable right now. Since the turnover for these is every 30 days, I find the value unbeatable. If this were a filter that needed to do heavy duty work for a long period of time, I would have waited for my review with regard to its performance. So far, so good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good filters
customer_reviews.text: High quality filter & framing, very well packed/protected, arrived quickly. Good price at Amazon for MERV 8's good filtering performance. However I use these as pre-filters for my whole-house MERV 11 furnace filters, so those thicker more expensive filters will last 6 months to a year - depending on high dust situations that vary over time. This is a perfect solution for my wife's COPD and allergy needs, though for ordinary usage these MERV 8 filtration are adequate by themselves. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These Filters Work for My Home
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell the difference between these filters and the more expensive filters. They work. They help keep the furnace and air clean. I don't have extreme allergens and for my home, these are working great. They fit well and are sturdy. This review is based on owing the product for 4 months. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Blouin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value For Price
customer_reviews.text: Based upon the reviews and the price for 6 filters, I decided to purchase these FilterBuy 16x25x1 since I never like to go above Merv 8 so that I do not restrict airflow to the furnace. These filters arrived well packaged and none of the filters were damaged. Now, I have purchased many other filters over the years that I believed were constructed better, but these were sound in build quality. They do have some extra cardboard covering both sides of the pleats to make them more rigid, but may possibly restrict some airflow. All-in-all it is an affordable filter.
customer_reviews.author: JG526

customer_reviews.title: Never had this problem before
customer_reviews.text: I have been running my furnace for over 15 years. During that time, the furnace tripped just twice. I placed one of these filters in and my furnace tripped 4 times in about 2 weeks. I put another filter in and it tripped the next day. Needless to say I was fed up so I went and bought my usual fitrete filters and haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The size of the filter
customer_reviews.text: The size of these filters is smaller than actually described on the ads: the width is measured 13 1/2" and the length is 23 1/2" and it would not fit into my AC return housing frame. I still have 6 filters which are not in use, it's still in a brand new condition and stored in plastic wrap. I am wondering could i return these filters and get refund or exchange.The reason it takes too long to notify you because i normally place an order the filter the months ahead before it run out. In addition i like to support the product made in USA that why i bought these filters from your company.
customer_reviews.author: Chau Q. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and economical furnace filters
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from Filter Buy. Very efficient and the price is economical. Filters cat hair ,smoke and dust. Delivery was fast .
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Order was placed and the filters arrived quickly and on time. Biggest concern was how well they performed, without being noisy. Our last set of filters were very flimsy and buckled over time. When this occurred they caused an awful racket when our HVAC would run. These new filters are a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I researched AC filters and found these had a good rating so I bought 6. Not very satisfied, they are a bit smaller in width & fell into the return space. I need to figure out a way to keep them stable without making noise. We have only recently started having noise issues with this return (singing/whining), that I guess has to do with the filters since the return didn't have issues the past 20 years(replaced the whole unit 5 years ago). We have yearly maintenance on all units. Like everything else these days it seems they make them cheaper but the cost continues to go up! I had great hope for these but honestly can not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: high quality filter
customer_reviews.text: I checked multiple sources and this is one of the best rated filters for your home. MERV 8 is recommended for most houses and while there are higher MERV valued filters, some can actually cause problems (air constriction), s I went with this recommendation. After unpacking, they are clearly high quality filters. I installed them and immediately noticed how much quieter they were than my previous filters. I assume that has to do with airflow. Overall great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: viperamd64

customer_reviews.title: Never a problem with these
customer_reviews.text: No glitches in the ordering of these through Amazon, ever. Only a tech knows for sure about the real quality of filters, but I like that these, unlike many, carry a MERV rating so at you at least have some idea of their purported filtering efficiency. We use MERV 8 - about a mid rating. All filters, rated inches x inches x one inch thick are less than 1 inch thick. Hence these and others rattle in the filter case when the blower first comes on. No problem, but I wonder why they all describe their filters as one inch thick when there are more like 3/4. Anyway, perfectly satisfied with these - prefer them over the others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good filter but their 24 by 24 is too small to fit in a 24 by 24 opening due to the finished size of 23-3/8 by 23-3/8. Our returns are in the ceiling and we have 3 of them. I have to tape them in place so that they stay put to close the cover. They may be fine for AC returns in the wall but if yours is in the ceiling beware of the actual size. I will have to go back to Filtrete due to the there tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: They do their job
customer_reviews.text: There's not a whole lot to say about these. I mean, they're air filters, and they do their job. I just wish they were cheaper. I don't understand how something that's basically cardboard, chicken wire, and some filtering material can be so pricey. Unfortunately, I have to order these filters online, since I have yet to find a hardware store that keeps 10x10x1 filters in stock at the store--but it seems like filters are always cheaper when you can pick them up at the store.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality & Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Before Covid19 was upon us I decided to increase the filtration in our home. It is absolutely amazing on how much less dust on our furniture and how better we rest at night. Its worth it for your health. Studies show, by making our homes so TIGHT & Closed in the Air Quality is Terrible. I like the package of 6 and I have plenty on hand. While people will tell you 90 days before change, I watch how much the units run. in Summer, especially as I ususlay change ours every 60 days. All know is our HVAC cleaning service asked last years, why is your unit so much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: good quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these filters and was pleasantly surprised at the quality and almost perfect fit in my heating unit. They may run small but not much different than more expensive filters. so far so good but I'm waiting to see if they last at least 3 months before the need to change them. I would recommend anyone to give them a try, can't go wrong for the price of 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: 1 month use works great
customer_reviews.text: 20x30x1 is not actual size Filter works fine, was surprised that the size was off. It did not collapse or deform after being used for 1 month. I would like the size to be corrected. The face of the filter had dust on it similar to other filter changes. Our Trane xl1200 system also has a electrostatic pre filter. I clean that once a year. When I check it I will know if excessive dust is on it and will update here.
customer_reviews.author: chris kolar

customer_reviews.title: Know Your Filter.
customer_reviews.text: I feel very comfortable using these filters. They are strong and shaped exactly right for my air conditioner. Our previous filters were MERV 12. These are MERV 8. MERV 12 is a thicker filter, and makes the a/c work harder. It is used in specific circumstances. MERV 8 filters ar lighter weight, and work well too. I have not noticed any extra dust. With allergy sufferers in my house I would notice. So it is working well. I would recommend these filters. N.B. Make sure to order the exact size and MERV rating.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite 12 X 24, Fits very loose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to try them out as they have a great price point. The filter however, is not quite 12 x 24. Photo shows their filter over top of the one that came out. It's about 3/8 inch smaller all around. Filters install easier when they are snug in the filter tray, especially if you are on an 8 ft ladder reaching a 12 ' ceiling. In addition, since it is loose, it slaps around when the fan goes on and then off. It may also allow dust to enter the ductwork around the loose edge. I guess it will work, I just wish it was true to size I bought 6 of them, so I guess I'll see...
customer_reviews.author: XQZMOISVP

customer_reviews.title: The proper size
customer_reviews.text: Right after I ordered these, my husband reminded me the one we removed was an inch too short. I'd ordered that size & immediately tried to cancel the order. Amazon contacted the seller & it was already too late to stop the shipment. The seller contacted me a couple of days later & I explained it was my fault & I understood. To my surprise, they told me to keep the original order of filters & they would send the correct size. What great customer service! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size at all
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great product until installation time. By the pictures you can see that the actual dimensions are not 14x24 but 13 3/8 x 23 3/8. I’m sure the manufacturer will claim its to increase comparability, but if you have a new furnace like mine expecting something more true to size, the filter will fall literally through the vertical filter stay channel and into the furnace cavity. I’d like that 40 minutes of my life back which I used trying to fish out the filter without damaging it. Even knowing the size issue, I could not get it to seat properly without easily losing it again. These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HVAC MERV 8 filters
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our family has allergies, asthma, etc., so we need to use a good HVAC filter. Plus there's only one fresh air return in the house, another reason to get a quality filter that allows good air flow. I was using a higher MERV rated filter which was limiting the air flow too much. When I found these on Amazon I figured I'd try them. They worked so well I've been using them for over a year now and I plan on continuing to use them, as long as the price and quality don't change.
customer_reviews.author: Ezrway

customer_reviews.title: Restricts airflow, may cause overheating for older furnaces
customer_reviews.text: Filters exactly as described, but they actually were too restrictive and did not allow enough air through to my gas furnace. This resulted in the heat sensor tripping every five minutes, shutting off the gas periodically. When I replaced the brand new filter back to the previous kind, the issues went away. If you have an older furnace and blower, be aware this could be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: great filter
customer_reviews.text: as far as i can tell its worth its money! we have a trane with the uv light, i replace this filter every month since they are cheap and do the work of catching dust and air borne bugs (after they are killed by the light). i think they are constructed well. i cant speak to hard numbers for performance though.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great value, does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: Good price on a basic filter. My HVAC is older and doesn’t have the power for a more expensive, higher rated filter, and the same level filter costs significantly more at the big brick and mortar stores. The MERV rating works for what I need, as a much higher rated filter would reduce already low airflow in my house to almost nonexistent, and a minimally rated one just lets too many allergen-inducing particles through. It’s the balance my HVAC needs, if not what my allergies deserve, so in order to maintain airflow, I supplement with air purifiers around my house. This is my 3rd purchase of this pack and I’ll probably keep buying these until I replace my HVAC.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuko

customer_reviews.title: Came in the perfect size box so not crushed at all..
customer_reviews.text: Looked up what merv the anhammer ones we used were... These are 1 above.. Seems like a good comprimise tween air flo and particle filtration.. Googled a lot before purchase.. I had no idea ...used to just grab whatever... Also used to think 3 month meant 3-4 months... Realize now its really 1-3.. Since we have an older unit 5 cats and run the fan a lot to keep basement warmer and bedrooms cooler i will be changing every 4-6 weeks... Lets face it, theyre not really that expensive compared to a new unit!.. Btw.. Have u checked the cabin air filter in car?.. 6 bucks on amazon and a youtube video.. Welllll worth it
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I want a refund. I paid almost $40 for these because they were supposed to last for up to 3 months each. They last for MAYBE month. NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: JESS

customer_reviews.title: Quality at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well made filters that have quality materials and are very competively priced. One minor complaint - filter is slightly smaller than most others. The 14x14 is actually 13.5x13.5. Most other brands actual size is 1/4th inch or less smaller than the advertised size. The consequence is that the filter is NOT held in place by the friction tabs in the frame. Not a huge deal since the filter is secured when the grill is closed and locked. But if you are installing a filter in the ceiling return air it won’t temporarily stay in place while the grill I’d open and that may be a bit clumsy if the reach is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for furnace filter
customer_reviews.text: Just received and installed these filters in my furnaces. I need three per furnace and fit just right. They are sturdy unlike so of the others which are floppy. These has a wire mesh on the back to support the filter fabric which is also nice. The price is also much better than the big box stores and having them as subscribe and save ensures I replace them every six months. The only reason I gave four stars was that one of the filters was dented pretty good on one corner so it took some work to get it straight. The box they came in had no dents so it didn't happen in the trip to my hous. I
customer_reviews.author: P. Sandell

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were a Mer 8 rating which is what I always use, but I am dusting my furniture every other day now and use to be able to go a week. Way too much work. I would return if possible and order something else but have used one. Bought these as the price was right but I guess its true that you get what you pay for. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Cece Oström

customer_reviews.title: Work great at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These are top quality filters for a good price. I bought them after a lot of research. I had been using 3M, which make consistently top quality products. Those are priced higher. I decided to save a little money and see how these are. Great quality out of the box. The cloth filter part is thick and well made. They are solid. The cardboard frame is good. I am very happy with my purchase and I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these filters, they fit perfectly and work perfectly also. I like the convenience of having 6 delivered at once and they arrived undamaged which is better than I can do sometimes in getting them home from the store! I echo others in their comments that Merv 8 is a good level of filtration without over taxing the A/C system.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B Florida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filters
customer_reviews.text: We love these filters. Second time we have purchased them. Work as well if not better than high end filters. We ususally replace our filters every other month and this month did it a bit more often due to forest fires in our area and we are all consumed in smoke. We will continue to buy these each year. Thrilled we found them!
customer_reviews.author: PyperPW

customer_reviews.title: Not a fair deal -- 96% of the product for 100% of the price.
customer_reviews.text: These look like a good deal but its a false By trimming 1/4" off the sides of these filters, not only do the filters not fit securely in the 14' x 14" housing, thereby allowing unfiltered air to leak around the filter. Additionally, the manufacturer is providing 4% less area for filtration. I will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filters
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a bit smaller then the ones I had. Both were the same size but these didn’t fit tightly in the opening in the ceiling so I had to hold them in place as I put the screen up. As I removed my hand they came down on the screen and I closed them in like that. I know when I go to change them they will fall out if I’m not prepared to catch them. Other then that, they are in and I expect they will do the job as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Patty M

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this filters for the first time since ordering them awhile back. They are not fitting my 14x14 intake ducts. They are smaller than the previous brand of 14x14 filters I bought at FoodLion and previously online. I had to put a zig zag of cardboard next to it so that it would not fall out. Guess I will comment later on whether they filtration is at least good. Disappointed though :(
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Less Dust for Healthier  Lungs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these filters. Previously I had the reusable filters but because of a lung condition it was recommended that I purchase MERV 8 or above rated filters to get more dust out of the air. These filters are doing a good job and the amount of dust in the house is noticeably lower. The only drawback is you need to replace them more often because they trap more dust....a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: MrHawkeye

customer_reviews.title: BEST MERV RATING FOR CLEANING AIR/EFFICIENCY. GOOD CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: I order these online because they are the only Place I can find this size and they are way way less expensive on Amazon as well. They come packaged and protected well and have just high enough MERV rating to be confident about the clean air in my house but still low enough to efficiently move the air. Replacing your filters is better for your health and your wallet/furnace. Change them often.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruthAndNothingBut

customer_reviews.title: I had thought the Merv 12 would give me better air-quality. I don’t know that I can tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this to replace a Merv 12 filter that I had been using for the last 6 to 8 months. I had thought the Merv 12 would give me better air-quality. I don’t know that I can tell the difference, but I do think my air conditioner likes the Merv eight a lot better. It seems to breathe better and doesn’t take as long to cool or heat the house
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my newer Furnace/Air Conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: When I had my new furnace/air conditioner installed, I was told to change my filter every month. It was mentioned that any filters would do an excellent job, so these filters are now ready to fulfill their duty. I liked the pricing on these and they came packaged all together. I will definitely be purchasing more of these in six months as they are perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida where regular care of our HVAC systems is very important. For me, that involves monthly change of the filter in my A/C system as well as cleaning the ducts every three months with white vinegar. This was my first time buying filters from FilterBuy, and so far it's looking very good. Product exactly as advertised, perfect fit for my HVAC system, an excellent price and amazingly quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Michlin

customer_reviews.title: Just stock up on them!
customer_reviews.text: These things can so easily be on the back burner of life however are so necessary and can save you from a huge heater/AC unit disaster! I swap mines out every 3 months especially because we have a french bulldog and my husband has asthma. I can’t stand running out of these guys because they’re so easy to forget! But I will forever buy them in bulk I never run out and I don’t worry about them!
customer_reviews.author: Rheanne

customer_reviews.title: I hate overpaying for airfilters but demand high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is no 'rocket science' when it comes to filters. So I buy a quality product at a fair price. This size (10x30x1) is hard to find at the big box stores and is outrageously priced if you do. FilterBuy produces a high quality product at a very reasonable price, delivered to my door. I've had these before and this was a refill. I will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: APG

customer_reviews.title: Whistle while you sleep!!! Way too small and allow for a ton of return noise
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible just like every other filter that undersizes a half inch. Their actual dimensions are 13.5 x 13.5...that’s an inch of gap you need to fill to keep these in place! Why would they do that?!!! These are just too small for an actual 14x14 return and I had to constantly fix them to stop the howling and rushing of air keeping us up at night. I had to jam spacers, pop out the grill spacers but no matter what I did, they were so loud because these are too small! I bought filters with an actual size of 13.75 x 13.75 and they are so silent. Check your measurements and be careful with any filter this small.
customer_reviews.author: Metzee

customer_reviews.title: Great. Delivered perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the mail today. Put them in and are working like, well, air filters. I saw a bunch of reviews saying that the packaging wasn’t good and that they were delivered damaged. I didn’t have that issue. They were in perfect shape so I’m guessing they fixed that issue. Impressed and looks like good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NoneUrBusiness

customer_reviews.title: Good Price/convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like to change my HVAC filter in my house weekly to biweekly as I have a Golden Retriever and the filters get dirty quickly. I used to by expensive filters, but decided to try these. They seem to work just as well at collecting particles and the system continues to run well. I like keeping a nice supply at hand so I don't have to worry about running low, and these are doing the job. The price is very reasonable so I'll keep w/this brand going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 Smaller Than Size - Causes air leaks and noise
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several sizes of FilterBuy filters and they consistently are smaller (1/2") than the needed/spec'ed size. This permits unfiltered air to bypass the filter and creates whistling noises. Recently sold a house that had new FilterBuy filters and the inspector noted that it needs to be replaced. Returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: A review before I have had a chance to use it---appears to be a quality filter
customer_reviews.text: I just received these filters a few days ago and have not had a chance to even use them. All I can rate is the appearance. The filter appears to be well made. It has a reinforced font and back, unlike the flimsy Flitrete filter or similar filters. This filter compares favorably with Purolater. I will be happy to, issue a complete review after I have had a chance to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom  G.

customer_reviews.title: My APOLOGY, I received 6 of 6 filters just as stated in the Amazon description.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the exterior demension is approximately 1/4 inch less than other brands. WELL ABOUT time, if your air return frame was installed with screws with a ratchet screw head, THESE FIR ABSOLUTELY PERFECT. This has been a nightmare for me with the exact 20x30 INCH when installing them in the top 18 foot ceiling. THE esmall cut back is to allow clearence for the screw heads. BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Beware

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: Realistically, I have no scientific evidence that they work great, but I think they do at minimal a decent job and I like being able to look at them and decide to throw the used ones out because of the price. I usually check once a month. Sometimes I determine they can go another week or two before being replace. Again I think value for product.
customer_reviews.author: ron holycross

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Mildew
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived and didn't open it right away. Went to use them only to find the filters inside have mildew on them (see pic).
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: No Problem
customer_reviews.text: Great service and shipping time. Price is right. I have not installed any of the filters yet, but in looking at them I think they will do just fine. That particular size is hard to find and when I do find them in stores they are very expensive. It appears they only have the "super hyper allergenic" kind. (Whatever that means.) I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Goesyard

customer_reviews.title: Great product - more affordable than alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Most filters in my experience are a racket - it's a pretty basic device and while you shouldn't buy the cheapest - you shouldn't buy the most expensive either. It's like when Dollar Shave Club disrupted the razor market - no one needs a $40 pack of 8 razors. FilterBuy has a good enough product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: hgpilot - MM

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Filters fit as expected. They did arrive with some minor dings and bends but nothing which was not easily fixed by reforming the pleats. I’ve had them installed about a mo th now and they work as expected. For the price I will purchase again! Packaging is my only “negative” star. Some pleats were misshapen and the outer box had small crushed part. Again this doesn’t seem to effect performance and the pleat issue was easily corrected by reshaping the pleat.
customer_reviews.author: chris s

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size labeling
customer_reviews.text: The 10"×10"×1" is actually 9 1/2"×9 1/2"×3/4", and they do not fit correctly. Other brands I have purchased are 9 3/4"×9 3/4" and they fit much better. Return air bypasses the filter, I had to use duct tape to keep the air from bypassing the filter. These filters are priced higher than others and they don't fit properly I feel like I wasted my money. Other brands tell you the actual size but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as a small package in a big shipping box
customer_reviews.text: These filters are well made, labeled well and packaged well. The price is great, especially compared to the 'big box' stores! However, they were shipped to me in a shipping box approximately 8 inches too long. Since there wasn't any internal shipping materials (e.g. air pillows) the shipping box was pushed in and several of the filters were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: cmartin

customer_reviews.title: ... filters are as advertised and seem to be a pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: The filters are as advertised and seem to be a pretty good quality. Only issue I had with them (which is why it is 4 stars instead of 5) was after taking them out of the box, some of the filters were bent around the edges and corners as if they'd been banged around a little. Despite this small issue, the filters work and fit properly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, I saw a few folks report their size is slightly smaller, and they are, but, work ok in our return grills. They have a cardboard grid over the intake area that other filters do not have. That cardboard grid decreases the actual filtration surface so I cut it off of my filters before installing and that did not compromise the stability or strength of the filters. Manufacturer may want to re-think that design.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received this order and I am disappointed with the product. I paid more for these instead of ordering the less expensive filters I saw online because the picture online made it look I was getting a better quality filter. There are far fewer baffles on the actual product received and the frame is dented and rippled. I will opt for another brand next time. Don't be fooled by the name on these. They are not a premium filter.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions are not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The filter seemed like a decent product but the actual dimensions are a quarter inch shorter than the actual dimensions on the packaging. They fit kind of loose in the furnace. If they actually made it the right size or the actual size they put on the package it wouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality & price
customer_reviews.text: I'm just happy to be able to find filters! Here in So Cal where the wildfires haven taken control, the air has been always poor to unhealthful. Even with my home be closed its not airtight!. Couldn't find filters my size for my home, changing filters about every 30-45 days. Amazon had them. So I stocked up
customer_reviews.author: socalgroove

customer_reviews.title: Breathe easy
customer_reviews.text: Our new home in N.C. gave us our first central air experience. The summers also made a smooth functioning HVAC system a necessity. I haven't met or heard of a HVAC service that doesn't outrageously overcharge for parts & labor. Doing this myself every three months helps save $.
customer_reviews.author: michael clayton

customer_reviews.title: Merv 8 is pretty dense
customer_reviews.text: Merv 8 is what I ordered. With my application the air flows much easier with a lesser Merv factor. Merv 8 is just too dense and restricts my system air flow. I was surprised on how well it filtered micro particles and dust. But again, I need something more porous for my air conditioner setup.
customer_reviews.author: J Delelys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t measure 12x24
customer_reviews.text: Actual measurement is like 11-1/2” x 23-1/2”. I didn’t see anywhere on the description the actual measurements. In my opinion if your trying to keep out dust particles and mold spores and other air contaminants, I don’t think these filters are for you. I tried to save time and money by ordering these, but I feel like throwing these away and just going to the store to buy a filter that actually measures 12x24.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: BORDERS ON BEING TO SMALL. DO NOY BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Tha actual dimensions 11 3/8 X 23 3/8 X 3/4. This filter barely covers the standard inlet of the air return register. it's small size also causes the filter drop making a clunking noise every time the fan shuts off. I do not recommend this product. American made and very poorly done.
customer_reviews.author: Lente Loquito

customer_reviews.title: The came on time and seem to be quality filters.
customer_reviews.text: We have had the hottest summer on record. 100 plus since the first of May with not one drop of rain. It has also been so dusty. Having to change filters a little more often. These filters came well packaged and of quality material. I bought the big package and will definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cleota Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to know quality, due to poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The filters seem to fit, after I pulled out the wrinkled corners and straightened them out enough to fit in the HVAC unit. The packaging was very poor and was over twice the size of the 6-pack of filters. There was no filler or air-packs to cushion them in the gigantic box either.
customer_reviews.author: R. Winebrinner

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than previous store one I bought
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and love the ship to house and auto ship option. Helps me to remember its time to change them out. I plan on changing mine every month. Due to 3 dogs and 2 cats and Florida weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits loose
customer_reviews.text: Every time the HVAC system sucks in air, it lifts the filter and makes a noise that sometimes wakes up my daughter because of the loose fit. I had a 3M filter in it previously, and it wasn't loose. Very annoying that something like this can be an issue for something so simple like air filters.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: changed my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing filter I have ever had. I've been looking for this filter all my life. Before this filter, I'd walk into my home and could barely see due to the thickness of air pollutants. After installing this filter, my home is as crisp and clean as a york peppermint patty. I had forgotten what the inside of my home looked like, but now I can see it again. Don't go for one of those "other guys " filters. You might save $1.99 but is it really worth it?
customer_reviews.author: Marc Weissman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These filters are of very good quality and so far have performed very satisfactorily (have just installed one). I am using them in an a not so usual capacity (not for HVAC filtration), and they will see more extreme duty than would a furnace would require. I will be able to give a more detailed assessment in about a month. I like the fact that they are manufactured in the states, and are not budget busters because of it. Definitely worth a try. P.S. the only reason I gave 4 stars on the presentation is because one of the filters was crushed on one corner during shipping. This is, of course, no fault of FilterBuy's
customer_reviews.author: 4string1der

customer_reviews.title: Work well in my system
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd subscribe & save order. I have 2 systems upstairs that use this size filter. The filters have been packaged well, so have not had any damage in shipping. They fit well in my systems, and appear to be filtering out whatever they're supposed to. I usually change them every 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: The filter is working like it should, loved the price and certainly appreciate that they are made in the USA. There were many comments regarding the outside packaging not holding up so the filters were arriving damaged. Most of the those reviews were older so maybe the packaging was upgraded, mine arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: pdxrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a new AC system put in and Russet air conditioning suggested these filters. The cost is great they said that they were fine to use. I can't tell you how well the product works yet because I just put it in. One of mine came a little smashed... Looks like someone kneeled on it
customer_reviews.author: LJMinTX

customer_reviews.title: Quality filters but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I only gave four stars because the actual filter size is 14.5" x 20". I ordered these because I NEEDED 15" x 20". To be fair, it probably gives the correct size in the description and I probably just didn't read carefully. But why call them 15 x 20 if they are 14.5 x 20. It makes no sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: RHJ_pops

customer_reviews.title: Work fine for my HVAC air conditioner heating system
customer_reviews.text: sized as specified in desription. Work fine for my HVAC air conditioner heating system.
customer_reviews.author: L. Baillie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and makes "cleaning" the A.C. a breeze! My grandma has an older model a.c. unit which still has the old reusable metal filters. I love that they're reusable, but they no longer do the job. These paper filters make it so much easier on her!
customer_reviews.author: HippieShay

customer_reviews.title: Size is Smaller that Listed
customer_reviews.text: Just installed a filter and found that the size is not 14' but actually 13.5" so that it barely stays inside the frame of the ceiling intake. I had to hold it in place and close up the ceiling intake grid so it wouldn't fall out. Won't buy them again. On the plus side, they are well made and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Cauda

customer_reviews.title: great filters at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy order and receive. Just what we needed at a good price - way better than driving to Lowes or Home Depot, and better quality than the kind WalMart had.
customer_reviews.author: J Cat W

customer_reviews.title: Sizes?? - 11 - 11/16 x 11 - 11/16 x 3/4
customer_reviews.text: Actual size of the filter are at least 1/4 inch less all around. Wish the actual size was made clear instead in the headlines. A bit misleading....
customer_reviews.author: Sam O.

customer_reviews.title: It's a filter, but smells
customer_reviews.text: These came sealed in wrapping. When I opened the wrapping, a strong smell of garlic salt came from the filters. I put one in my furnace. Now, whenever it turns on, it smells like garlic salt from the vents for a few minutes. I hope this smell dissipates over time, but for now, I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: juniorkirk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my order in excellent condition and on time. I have used these filters in our house for several years now and since we have multiple air conditioners/filters buying them in quantity is the way to go. They have performed excellently and are a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: smith78884

customer_reviews.title: Good Furnace Filters.
customer_reviews.text: We have a unique size of filter in our air handler and could not find it locally. The filters were available on Amazon and we ordered and received them in two days. They seem to be good quality and will work perfectly in our air handler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They are much better filters than I have purchased locally in recent years. The space is 15 7/8" by 15 7/8", and 16x16 filters usually have to be bent just a little. These fit very well. I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: hephaestion

customer_reviews.title: Good filters!
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, good quality and great fit! I am pretty happy with it; if and only if there was no minor damage during shipping/handling (clearly the pack of filters were "gripped on" somewhat harder than it should, plus the pack of filters were dropped on its corners...). Slightly disappointed but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and being delivered to me is wonderful. It’s so hard to find the right size for my two units. Having them come is super. They cut down on our allergy issues and I add a light scent to the intake area and aroma therapy solves Florida crud.
customer_reviews.author: janrents

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but glad to get them.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. Don’t know why these things went up so much in price.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: great find
customer_reviews.text: I had a washable filter but it was going bad and my ac guy told me to get this size. I couldn't find the size at home depot so I ordered this one since buying the incorrect size could lead to a dirty coil. so far it works like a charm. nice sturdy feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: lisandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These filters are just what I needed. I try to change the furnace filter every month but because these last up to 90 days, I can be late and not feel guilty. Having them shipped in multiples give me no excuse to make the change!
customer_reviews.author: Pattigirl101

customer_reviews.title: Not 14x25 but 13.5x 25
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit! Picture this: I am an 82 year old woman up on a ladder trying to replace a furnace filter that keeps falling on my head. Not fun! They do not measure 14 inches as stated. FilterBuy customer service was prompt and professional in responding, but they referred me to Amazon where I got a refund minus a restocking fee because the order was well over the deadline for returns. My advice is if you buy furnace filters ahead to have them on hand, open the package and measure them before the free return period is up. I'm going back to 3M!
customer_reviews.author: Jane E.

customer_reviews.title: Work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these filters for about 4 months, changing them monthly. Picture shows one month use on left compared to new filter on right. Seems like they're doing their job. I like it that they fit snugly into the opening. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: ReadProf

customer_reviews.title: Not great, just OK
customer_reviews.text: Product not up to name brand standards. Media pleating is loose and few in qty. Items where crushed and deformed even though outer box was not damaged. My opinion is to pay more for better product.
customer_reviews.author: BSEE

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The quality was much higher than the filter supplied by my furnace installer. The mesh on these filters is made of steel, as opposed to the plastic on most. My local big box home improvement store did not carry this size filter.
customer_reviews.author: NPC#6,669Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing, the first time came in a bit bended. And this time it comes in perfect condition. It fits well and the quality is exceed expectation. Value for the money. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lilylu7

customer_reviews.title: no dust in the house
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy duty filters, and an odd size that isn't sold in many stores. Glad to find them on line. My housekeeper is very diligent in changing them on a regular basis. So far, through the snowy winter they have done well, now for the dusty summer days when the house is open. THat will be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Balance of Filtration and Airflow
customer_reviews.text: The order was well packaged and arrived quickly. I researched technical articles on furnace filters and these met the recommended specifications. The backing and folds look uniform and correct.
customer_reviews.author: DON P

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I won’t buy again. The filter material itself seems fine. It’s just that they aren’t 20x25. Maybe 19x24? They don’t stay in place in my unit (get sucked through) and there’s a space where unfiltered air gets by. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good filters, however, I was supposed to receive 6 of the "Buggers", but only have 4 filters. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mercado

product_meta.title: FilterBuy 20x25x4 MERV 8 Pleated AC Furnace Air Filter, (Pack of 6 Filters), Actual size 19 3/8" x 24 3/8" x 3 5/8", 20x25x4 – Silver
feature_bullets: CHECK YOUR SIZE. Nominal Size 20x25x4, Actual Size: 19 3/8" x 24 3/8" x 3 5/8". 20x25x4 MERV 8 Pleated Air Filter for AC HVAC or Furnace (Pack of 6 Filters). AFB Silver MERV 8, comparable with MPR 300 / 600 (clean living and dust & pollen).
MADE IN THE USA: Manufactured by FilterBuy in the USA using 100% American made components.
TRAPS 90% OF AIRBORNE PARTICLES: Say goodbye to dust, debris, lint, pollen, and pet dander. Say hello to better indoor air quality!
LONG-LASTING: Designed to last up to 3 months. Ideal for residential and commercial use.

HIGH QUALITY: Filter frames are made of beverage board, which stays strong through humidity and temperatures up to 200° F. Synthetic media provides significantly higher particulate efficiency than standard cotton media.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,889 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
